name: StreamStatsWidgetsOverlayApp
description: An app to show stream stats widgets in an overlay.

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . StreamStatsWidgetsOverlayApp --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Stream Stats Widgets Overlay App"

author: barnab_why
